heading: Content of privacy notices
text: The privacy notice must include: categories of NPI collected, categories of NPI disclosed, categories of affiliates and nonaffiliated third parties to whom NPI is disclosed

heading: Limits on disclosure to nonaffiliated third parties
text: You may not disclose any NPI to a nonaffiliated third party unless you have provided notice and reasonable opportunity to opt out.

heading: Standards for Safeguarding
text: You shall develop, implement, and maintain a comprehensive information security program

heading: Elements of Information Security Program
text: Designate a qualified individual, conduct risk assessments, design safeguards, monitor effectiveness
